title: Topic 003 Question 014
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains the public IPv4 addresses shown in the following table.
You plan to create a load balancer named LB1 that will have the following settings:
Which public IPv4 addresses can be used by LB1?
options: IP1, IP3, IP4, and IP5 only
IP1, IP2, IP3, IP4, and IP5
